Title: Permits videoconferencing and remote participation in public meetings under certain circumstances
Summary: Permits videoconferencing and remote participation in public meetings under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Add ยง103-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to permitting videoconferencing and remote participation in public meetings under certain circumstances; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
